name: Cubicle Fugitive
tagline: Don't trust us, trust our clients.
description: We are a full-service brand, marketing, and digitalagency that specializes in building marketing strategies for professional service firms and B2B companies. We're professional, easy to work with, and cost-effective with a singular focus on delivering the highest level of client service, especially within tight timelines. And, if you’ll notice, we also like to have a bit of fun.
